name: The Backrooms (Early testing version) (v0.0.3.1)
description:
Just an early testing build for this maze thingy i was making.

I plan to make this a survival horror game with randomly generated backrooms and multiple enemies, but until i get good at C# and Unity, that probs won't happen for a bit.

WASD to move, mouse to look around.

To do: Add an ending screen. Shouldn't be too hard...right?

UPDATE LOG:

0.0.2 (Medium sized): Added a short intro thing to show the actual clipping out of reality part. Also added a goal to the end of the maze (which doesn't do anything yet)

0.0.3 (Medium sized): Added a menu screen that WORKS! Spent so long figuring out why it wouldn't start the game when you hit play, but it works! Also added ambient sounds!

0.0.3.1 (Bugfix): Ambience now plays for a while instead of like 5 seconds
